concept.title: Overview of the Oxygen AI Positron Assistant Enterprise Add-on
concept.shortdesc: The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant Enterprise add-on enhances technical documentation with advanced AI support, tailored to company-specific AI services like OpenAI, Microsoft Azure OpenAI, and Anthropic Claude.

body.p: The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant Enterprise add-on provides advanced AI-support for technical documentation writers throughout their content creation process by using a company-specific AI service, by configuring the company's specific connection: OpenAI, Microsoft Azure OpenAI, Anthropic Claude.
A detailed list of actions and functionality available in the add-on is presented in the AI Positron topic.
